description:
Even during summer vacation, lone wolf Horikita would rather remain locked in her room studying than interacting with others. One day, Ayanokoji invites her to visit the pool with some of the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Muchi na Yuujin Hodo Kiken na Mono wa Nai. Kashikoi Teki no Hou ga Yoppodo Mashi da.
Nothing Is As Dangerous as an Ignorant Friend; a Wise Enemy Is to Be Preferred.
Rien n`est si dangereux qu`un ignorant ami. Mieux vaudrait un sage ennemi.
لا شيء بخطورة الصديق الجاهل، العدو الحكيم أخير
無知な友人ほど危険なものはない. 賢い敵のほうがよっぽどましだ.
무지한 벗만큼 위험한 것은 없다, 현명한 적이 차라리 낫다
